name.description: The name of the DNS CAA Record. If you are creating the record in the apex of the zone use `"@"` as the name.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the DNS Zone (parent resource

zone_name.description: Specifies the DNS Zone where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

record.description: A list of values that make up the CAA record. Each `record` block supports fields documented below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

flags.description: Extensible CAA flags, currently only 1 is implemented to set the issuer critical flag.

tag.description: A property tag, options are issue, issuewild and iodef.

value.description: A property value such as a registrar domain.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the DNS CAA Record.

create.description: Used when creating the DNS CAA Record.

update.description: Used when updating the DNS CAA Record.

read.description: Used when retrieving the DNS CAA Record.

delete.description: Used when deleting the DNS CAA Record.
